categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Daxarn was a male Nautolan Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. During the Invasion of Belsavis around 3641 BBY he was stationed in the High Security Section of the Belsavis prison.
Master Daxarn appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic as a rare champion spawn that appears in the High Security Section.
